0010000110101100 0110101001101010 1 -> sum: 1000110000010111, cout: 0

0101010110011101 1000001000010011 1 -> sum: 1101011110110001, cout: 0
1010010100100101 1011001000001111 1 -> sum: 0101011100110101, cout: 1
1001100001010010 1001110101101010 1 -> sum: 0011010110111101, cout: 1
0101011011110011 1110110010111000 1 -> sum: 0100001110101100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
